dependencies.description: A simple framework for building complex web applications.
dependencies.name: py-flask

dependencies.description:
Simple paginate for flask (study from will_paginate). Use bootstrap css
framework, supports bootstrap2&3 and foundation.
dependencies.name: py-flask-paginate

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: Monty is the missing complement to Python.
dependencies.name: py-monty

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
The PyMongo distribution contains tools for interacting with MongoDB
database from Python. The bson package is an implementation of the BSON
format for Python. The pymongo package is a native Python driver for
MongoDB. The gridfs package is a gridfs implementation on top of
pymongo.
dependencies.name: py-pymongo

dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.
dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil

dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order
dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description: FireWorks stores, executes, and manages calculation workflows.
name: py-fireworks

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
